member.name: T:Figlut.Configuration.Manager.InstallUtilSupport
member.summary: RunInstaller attribute - Allows the .Net framework InstallUtil.exe to install the assembly. SnapInInstaller class - Installs snap-in for MMC.

member.summary: SnapInSettings attribute - Used to set the registration information for the snap-in. SnapIn class - Provides the main entry point for the creation of a snap-in. SelectionFormViewSnapIn class - SnapIn that uses a Form in the result pane

member.name: P:Figlut.Configuration.Manager.Properties.Resources.Culture
